```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# detach all libraries

detachAllPackages <- function() {
  basic.packages <- c("package:stats", "package:graphics", "package:grDevices", "package:utils", "package:datasets", "package:methods", "package:base")
  package.list <- search()[ifelse(unlist(gregexpr("package:", search()))==1, TRUE, FALSE)]
  package.list <- setdiff(package.list, basic.packages)
  if (length(package.list)>0)  for (package in package.list) detach(package,  character.only=TRUE)
}
detachAllPackages()

# function to load libraries

pkgTest <- function(pkg){
  new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[,  "Package"])]
  if (length(new.pkg)) 
    install.packages(new.pkg,  dependencies = TRUE)
  sapply(pkg,  require,  character.only = TRUE)
}

})

# function for removing trailing zeros 
round_df <- function(x, digits) { 
  numeric_columns <- sapply(x, mode) == 'numeric'
  x[numeric_columns] <-  round(x[numeric_columns], digits)
  x
}
```

```{r}
WBSI_Validation$MEAQ62_Total_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$MEAQ62_Total - mean(WBSI_Validation$MEAQ62_Total)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$MEAQ62_Total)

WBSI_Validation$MEAQGA_Total_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$MEAQGA_Total - mean(WBSI_Validation$MEAQGA_Total)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$MEAQGA_Total)

WBSI_Validation$BEAQ_Total_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$BEAQ - mean(WBSI_Validation$BEAQ)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$BEAQ)

WBSI_Validation$MEAQSF_Total_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$MEAQSF_Total - mean(WBSI_Validation$MEAQSF_Total)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$MEAQSF_Total)

WBSI_Validation$MEAQBF_Total_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$MEAQBF_Total - mean(WBSI_Validation$MEAQBF_Total)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$MEAQBF_Total)

WBSI_Validation$wbsi_STDZ <- (WBSI_Validation$wbsi - mean(WBSI_Validation$wbsi)) / sd(WBSI_Validation$wbsi)

WBSI_Total_62SF_Wide <- WBSI_Validation[,c("MEAQ62_Total_STDZ", "MEAQGA_Total_STDZ", "BEAQ_Total_STDZ", "MEAQSF_Total_STDZ", "MEAQBF_Total_STDZ", "wbsi_STDZ")]

WBSI_Total_62SF_Wide$ID <- 1:nrow(WBSI_Total_62SF_Wide) 

# Reshape data from wide to long format
WBSI_Total_62SF_Long <- melt(WBSI_Total_62SF_Wide, id.vars = c("ID", "wbsi_STDZ"), variable.name = "MEAQ", value.name = "MEAQ_Score_STDZ")
```

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(WBSI_Total_62SF_Long, aes(x = MEAQ_Score_STDZ, y = wbsi_STDZ, color = factor(MEAQ))) +

  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F, na.rm=T) +
```

```{r}
p2 <- ggplot(BFI2N_Total_62SF_Long, aes(x = MEAQ_Score_STDZ, y = BFI2_NE_STDZ, color = factor(MEAQ))) +

  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F, na.rm=T) +
  theme_minimal() +
```

```{r}
p8 <- ggplot(SWLS_Total_62SF_Long, aes(x = MEAQ_Score_STDZ, y = SWLS_STDZ, color = factor(MEAQ))) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F, na.rm=T) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.line = element_line(color = "grey70")) + 
  labs(x = "MEAQ Total Score ", y = "SWLS Total Score ") + 
  scale_color_manual(name = "MEAQ Scale", values = c("#332288", "#CC6677", "#DDCC77", "#117733", "#88CCEE"), labels = c("MEAQ-62 (Full Form)", "MEAQ-GA (Short Form)", "BEAQ (Short Form)", "MEAQ-SF (Short Form)", "MEAQ-BF (Short Form)")) + 
  xlim(-4,4)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(grid)
grid_arrange_shared_legend <-
  function(...,
           ncol = length(list(...)),
           nrow = 1,
           position = c("bottom", "right")) {
    
    plots <- list(...)
    position <- match.arg(position)
    g <-
      ggplotGrob(plots[[1]] + theme(legend.position = position))$grobs
    legend <- g[[which(sapply(g, function(x)
      x$name) == "guide-box")]]
    lheight <- sum(legend$height)
    lwidth <- sum(legend$width)
    gl <- lapply(plots, function(x)
      x + theme(legend.position = "none"))
    gl <- c(gl, ncol = ncol, nrow = nrow)
    
    combined <- switch(
      position,
      "bottom" = arrangeGrob(
        do.call(arrangeGrob, gl),
        legend,
        ncol = 1,
        heights = unit.c(unit(1, "npc") - lheight, lheight)
      ),
      "right" = arrangeGrob(
        do.call(arrangeGrob, gl),
        legend,
        ncol = 2,
        widths = unit.c(unit(1, "npc") - lwidth, lwidth)
      )
    )
    
    grid.newpage()
    grid.draw(combined)
    
    # return gtable invisibly
    invisible(combined)
    
  }

grobby3 <- grid_arrange_shared_legend(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, ncol=2, nrow=3, position = c("bottom", "right"))
ggsave("grobs3.png", grobby3, width = 30, height = 15, units = "in", limitsize=FALSE)
```

```{r}
total_df <- rbind(run1_df, run2_df, run3_df, run4_df, run5_df, run6_df, run7_df, run8_df, run9_df, run10_df)

total_df <- total_df[order(total_df$pheromone),]

total_df_long <- melt(setDT(total_df), id.vars = c("row_id"), variable.name = "fitmeasure")

total_df_long$fitmeasure <- factor(total_df_long$fitmeasure, levels = c("pheromone", "rmsea", "srmr", "crel"))

d1 <- total_df_long %>% 
  filter(fitmeasure == "pheromone")

d2 <- total_df_long %>% 
  filter(fitmeasure == "rmsea")

d3 <- total_df_long %>% 
  filter(fitmeasure == "srmr")

d4 <- total_df_long %>% 
  filter(fitmeasure == "crel")

ggplot(mapping = aes(x = fitmeasure, y = row_id)) +
  geom_tile(data = d1, aes(fill = value)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlGn", direction = 1, guide = guide_colorbar(title.position = "top"), name = "pheromone") + 
  ggnewscale::new_scale_fill() +
  geom_tile(data = d2, aes(fill = value)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "RdPu", direction = 1, guide = guide_colorbar(title.position = "top"), name = "rmsea") +
  ggnewscale::new_scale_fill() +
  geom_tile(data = d3, aes(fill = value)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "GnBu", direction = 1, guide = guide_colorbar(title.position = "top"), name = "srmr") +
  ggnewscale::new_scale_fill() +
  geom_tile(data = d4, aes(fill = value)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "OrRd", direction = 1, guide = guide_colorbar(title.position = "top"), name = "crel") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.text = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "right",
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank()) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL)
```

### Correlation Matrix

```{r}
totalscore_cormatrix <- MEAQ_DF[,c("MEAQ62_Total", "MEAQGA_Total", "BEAQ", "MEAQSF_Total", "MEAQBF_Total")]

totalscore_cormatrix_2 <- cor(totalscore_cormatrix)

# mat : is a matrix of data
# ... : further arguments to pass to the native R cor.test function
cor.mtest <- function(mat, ...) {
    mat <- as.matrix(mat)
    n <- ncol(mat)
    p.mat<- matrix(NA, n, n)
    diag(p.mat) <- 0
    for (i in 1:(n - 1)) {
        for (j in (i + 1):n) {
            tmp <- cor.test(mat[, i], mat[, j], ...)
            p.mat[i, j] <- p.mat[j, i] <- tmp$p.value
        }
    }
  colnames(p.mat) <- rownames(p.mat) <- colnames(mat)
  p.mat
}
# matrix of the p-value of the correlation
p.mat <- cor.mtest(totalscore_cormatrix)

cor.mat.totalscore <- totalscore_cormatrix %>% 
  cor_mat()

cor.mat.totalscore %>% 
  cor_get_pval()
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("~/Repositories/maple-aster/meaq_itemselection.csv")
df.matrix <- as.matrix(df[,c(2:63)])

co_occurrence_matrix <- t(df.matrix) %*% df.matrix

# Create an igraph object from the co-occurrence matrix
network_graph <- graph.adjacency(co_occurrence_matrix, mode = "undirected", weighted = TRUE)

# Remove self-loops if any (items can't co-occur with themselves)
network_graph <- simplify(network_graph, remove.loops = TRUE)

# Plot the graph
plot(network_graph, vertex.size = 5, vertex.label.cex = 0.5, edge.width = E(network_graph)$weight,   vertex.label.family = "sans",  vertex.label.color = 'black')
 
```
